foundations.title: Integrity
foundations.description: Doing the right thing no matter what, even when no one is looking.

foundations.title: Faith
foundations.description: Taking action to show you expect God to remain consistent.

foundations.title: Perseverance
foundations.description: Staying on the right path even through hard times.

foundations.title: Courage
foundations.description: Standing for what is right in the face of trials.

foundations.title: Humility
foundations.description: Remembering that when God moves it is for His glory and not for us to be arrogant.

foundations.title: Willingness
foundations.description: Being ready for God to move whether or not we see Him working right now.

foundations.title: Wisdom
foundations.description: Learning to make decisions based on God's instructions.

foundations.title: Commitment
foundations.description: Being sold out to God and running to hard situations when He calls you there.

foundations.title: Adventure
foundations.description: Going when God tells you to go.

foundations.title: Boldness
foundations.description: Speaking when God tells you to speak.

foundations.title: Gratitude
foundations.description: Recognizing and Acknowledging the good that God has done in your life.

foundations.title: Hope
foundations.description: Expecting God to continue moving and remain consistent
